s: I've used more kinds of Shea butter than I care to think of. Some were so bad I had to add coconut oil after. Coconut oil is fine, it works really well for my husband, but my skin is more responsive to Shea. And this particular Shea is the best of probably at least ten I've tried. I’m glad I took the time to find out there are two kinds, and that ivory works a little better for those of us with drier skin. And I’m glad this brand ...
